import React,{useRef,useState} from 'react' import { IoDocumentAttach } from 'react-icons/io5' const Form = () => { const [files, setFiles] = useState([]) const inputFile = useRef(null) const handleClick = e => { inputFile.current.click() } const handleOnChange = e => { setFiles(e.target.files) console.log(files.length()) } return (
<>
) } export default Form
